Welcome to the rigBot documentation!
================================================

This is a customizable and adaptable modular rig builder framework and self-contained char pipeline for managing and organizing rig tasks, data and code.

offers  fully UI based and/or fully scriptable based approach  for handling,  creating, transferring, exporting, importing and other essential functions for managing scene file data in our rigs

The idea being that the UI simply serves as an interactive wrapper for the underlying code.   In short, anything you can do In the UI you can do with code and vice versa.


Contributors include Peter Christensen and Andrei Orehov,  Jen H., Casey Dame, Manny Wong and Olyssa Gurezova.

Tools are meant as framework to build upon in adaptable, expandable and migratable environment benefiting from collaborative participation
